text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
It's the weekend, so I head over to<n>the mall for some
shopping...

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
That's not right, not right at all! It<n>needs to be more like,
"Earth! Wind!<n>Sun!"

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
A familiar voice reverberates<n>throughout the mall. I start
walking<n>towards the direction it's coming<n>from.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
I told you—I want lighter shoes that<n>can turn on a dime, like,
ka-woosh!

text_block_list.name: Store Clerk
text_block_list.text: K-ka-woosh? Well then... how about<n>this pair of shoes?

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Hmm... Close! I need something<n>tougher-looking that'll
absorb the<n>force of my every step...

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Ugh, how should I put it? Sigh... Ifonly Trainer were around at times likethese—

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Qué?! Th-that voice... Trainer?!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
It seems like El's out shoe shopping,<n>but can't find the right
words to<n>describe her dream shoe to the store<n>clerk.
choice_data_list:
So you're looking for a pair of shoes that suits
you?

So you're looking for a pair of shoes that suits
you?

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Bueno! Right, but I can't put it into<n>words. My head gets all
jumbled and<n>mixed up.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
But Trainer, you know what kind of<n>shoe I want, right? I
mean, you're my<n>trainer, after all!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Which means you'll explain to thestore clerk for me, right? C'mon,we're the dynamic duo!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Gracias! I'm gracious! I'm grateful!<n>I'm jubilant, even! I've
got nothin' to<n>fear when Trainer's here!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
The shoes I want are as light as wind,<n>turn on a dime, and
feel like the warm<n>embrace of the earth... They're shoes<n>
full of passion!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Going off of El's description, I consult<n>the clerk to see if
they have any<n>bright-colored shoes with good grip,<n>
cushioning, and breathability.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Nice goin', Trainer! These shoes fit<n>my tastes to the T!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
I knew it—our hearts are connected.<n>Unbreakable bonds!
Unwavering trust!<n>Mutual understanding!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
That was like one of the team plays<n>Mama and I used to
come up with...<n>Right, this one time I went present<n>
shopping with Mama—

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Ahhh, I almost forgot! Trainer!<n>There's one more place I
wanna<n>check out!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: And so, El proceeds to bring me into a<n>fast-food joint.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Mmm, so many juicy smells... Wow,<n>they all look so good!
choice_data_list: You want me to help you order this time?
You want me to help you order this time?

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Hehe, not this time! Trainer, you just<n>wait here for me!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: With that, El queues up to have her<n>order taken.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Behold—my triumphant return!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: El fills the table with all of the food<n>she's just bought. But...

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Is that crimson flame blood or batter?!<n>No, the fry itself is
ablaze!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Spice is life! And the essence of life is<n>boiling red blood! Red,
hot—spicy!<n>Here's your serving of El's special<n>fries!
choice_data_list: I think I heard you say something scary there...

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Heh-heh. Trainer, aren't you curious?<n>Surely you're curious
to the true<n>nature of these red fries!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Then let me indulge your curiosity!<n>Behold, for this is the
secret sauce of<n>my kin!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
They finally sent me a bottle<n>yesterday, so I used up the
whole<n>bottle on this food—down to the last<n>drop!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Don't worry, it tastes great! Papa's<n>good with spicy food,
but even he<n>jumps out of his chair when he gets<n>a lick of
this sauce.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Now, Trainer! Don't be shy!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I might never recover if I eat this now.<n>Maybe I should
politely turn El down—

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Ehehe, you're the first person I've<n>ever let try this sauce.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Mama always told me, "Only use this<n>sauce when you're
eating with<n>family."

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
"It's too dangerous for those without<n>the tolerance to
handle it."

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Sí! I can only serve this sauce to<n>those I've opened my
heart up to!<n>That's how precious it is!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: And Trainer, you're special!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
After all, you're my partner! We're<n>tight as family, so of
course you can<n>try it!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Ehehe. This sauce is full of my love.<n>Consider this thanks
for your hard<n>work in training me.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Let's divide this between the two of<n>us and make this a
feast to<n>remember! C'mon Trainer, don't be<n>shy now...

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Yes, let's dig in! Haha, the food<n>won't be goin' anywhere,
so feel free<n>to savor the flavor!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
So... how is it? Are the flames of<n>passion welling up within
your body<n>yet?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I steel myself for a fiery impact, but it<n>really isn't that bad.
The spicy<n>seasoning is actually quite pleas—

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Haha! I see it was so tasty that<n>you're jumping for joy!
I'm happy<n>you like it, I really am!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
If you want, you can have my portion<n>too! Eat as much as
you want! This is<n>my gift to you!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I can't feel my tongue anymore, but I<n>do feel some sort of
power surging<n>through my body... I think.
